import sys
import math

primes = []

for i in range (1000001) :
	primes.append(1)
	
primes[0] = 0
primes[1] = 0
for i in range(1000001) :

	if primes[i] :
	
		j = i*2
		
		while j <= 1000000 :
			
			primes[j] = 0
			j+=i
			

T = int(sys.stdin.readline())

while T :

	N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
	
	rt = int(math.sqrt(N))
	
	if rt*rt == N :
			if primes[rt] == 1 :
				print "YES"
			else :
				print "NO"
		
	else :
	
		print "NO"
		
	T-=1
